meanings.sent1: Her favorite painting typifies her love for nature.
meanings.sent2: The red rose can typify love in many cultures.
meanings.sent3: The quirky hat typified her unique sense of style.
meanings.sent4: The old oak tree typifies strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The bright smile on her face typifies happiness and joy.

meanings.definition: To embody the essential characteristics of something
meanings.sent1: His dedication and hard work typify a true leader.
meanings.sent2: The majestic lion typifies courage and strength in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The messy desk typified chaos and disorganization.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse on the cliff typifies guidance and safety for sailors.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song typifies the essence of nostalgia and longing.
